== Main Inclusion Report for libfile-rsyncp-perl ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/l/libfile-rsyncp-perl, available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** Enhances backuppc to be able to use ssh+rsync as backend instead of ssh+tar.
 0. ''Security:''
** No CVE entries.
** No Secunia history.
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid.
** Does not open any port.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Package works out of the box without configuration.
** No Debian bugs.
** Does not deal with exotic hardware which we cannot support.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meets the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>
** Meets <nowiki>[[http://www.netfort.gr.jp/~dancer/column/libpkg-guide/libpkg-guide.html|Debian library packaging guide]]</nowiki> standards.
** Standard debhelper packaging, no patch system.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All in main.
 0. ''Comments:''
** The module was built for backuppc. We might even want it to depend on this perl-module...
